H0.text: all the motor neurons that control the skeletal muscles are. Voluntary

H1.text: all the motor neurons that control the skeletal muscles are. Efferent

H2.text: all the motor neurons that control the skeletal muscles are. Peripheral

H3.text: all the motor neurons that control the skeletal muscles are. Somatic

A4.text: The somatic nervous system controls all voluntary muscular systems within the body

A5.text: The somatic nervous system consists of nerves carrying efferent nerve fibers, which relay motor commands from the CNS to stimulate muscle contraction

A6.text: Somatic motor neurons originate in the central nervous system

A7.text: Somatic motor neurons project their axons to skeletal muscles
